name: Second Harvest of Silicon Valley
description: Second Harvest of Silicon Valley is one of the largest food banks in the nation, providing food to nearly half a million people each month through a network of 900+ partners and direct distribution sites.
fullDescription: Second Harvest of Silicon Valley is one of the largest food banks in the nation, providing food to nearly half a million people each month through a network of 900+ partners and direct distribution sites.
whatTheyOffer:
- Free groceries at 900+ distribution sites
- Fresh produce, proteins, dairy, and staples
- Mobile food pantries
- Home delivery for homebound individuals
- No income verification required
- CalFresh enrollment assistance
howToGetIt: Use the online Food Locator tool or call the Food Connection hotline. Find a site near you, check the schedule, and bring bags to carry food. Most sites require no ID or paperwork.
keywords: Second Harvest, Silicon Valley, food bank, free food, food pantry, groceries, produce, home delivery, CalFresh, Santa Clara, San Mateo
